document_data.mainbody:
Ga Nomes was a gnomish drinking song apparently written by Mintiper Moonsilver as a "thank you" to the gnomes of the High Forest who helped him to speed through the area via the Trail of Mists.
The song had inspired many bar brawls since its first reported performance in the  and other gnomes had been adding their own verses in order to insult every audience.
The original went as follows
